thread.title: Extended-stay hotels revamp social hours, targeting a younger business traveler

author: Megan Rogers
title: Extended-stay hotels revamp social hours, targeting a younger business traveler
text: Donna Abbott-Vlahos | Albany Business Review The Residence Inn by Marriott in East Greenbush, New York, is profiled in a Fortune storyâ€¦ more About 700 Residence Inns are hosting happy hours to appeal to a younger demographic. The Residence Inn by Marriott in East Greenbush, New York, is profiled in a Fortune story on its weeknight happy hours that feature beer, wine and appetizers.
